ygData.subject: RE: My first impression of the desert (story)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Good for you...:) This kind of thing has happend to me while poisoned and playing Hymn, but never while attacked. It goes like this......
ygData.messageBody:
>I hope you liked the story.

Good for you...:)

This kind of thing has happend to me while poisoned and playing Hymn, but
never while attacked.
It goes like this......

Ughhhh..........down.

Pop back up.... " hey guys Im ...." Ughhhhhh.... down.

Pop back up ... " I think I'm Poiso......." Ughnnnnnn.... ...down.

Pop back up....." Bandages...hel......" Ughnnnnnn..... down...

*Smile*
I usually call this .. "Seeing The Light"... and deciding that its not time
yet... heheh

Great story...

Sevin 19th Level Human Bard
on Brell
